game.name: Toey Weedz Smoke Dead Mirror
game.shortDescription: Toey Weedz is humanity's last hope... Or maybe not!? Because in Toey Weedz Smoke Dead Mirror, nothing is as it seems. Get ready for a comedic solo adventure in retro military shooter style that you won't soon forget!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Toey Weedz is humanity's last hope... Or maybe not!? Because in Toey Weedz Smoke Dead Mirror, nothing is as it seems. Get ready for a comedic solo adventure in retro military shooter style that you won't soon forget!
